feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:03AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Friday into Saturday... Elevated surf will develop Friday and continue into Saturday. Northwest winds of 15 to 25 mph are expected Friday into Saturday causing waves to wash up near the top of the beach. Minor beach erosion may occur and belongings left on the beach could wash away.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf through Thursday... Elevated surf will develop today and continue into Thursday. Westerly winds of 25 to 35 mph developing today will cause waves to wash near the top of the beach. Minor beach erosion may occur and belongings left on the beach could wash away.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf tonight into Friday... Elevated surf will develop tonight and continue into Friday. Westerly winds of 20 to 30 mph are expected to develop this afternoon and continue through Thursday night with waves washing up onto the beach. Minor beach erosion may occur and belongings left on the beach could wash away.
